Room.Name: Avatar Boulevard/Oceancrest Avenue Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Oceancrest Avenue and Avatar Boulevard.
Room.LongDescription: Oceancrest Avenue runs east and west through the central part of town, eventually connecting the Eastern Entrance to the city to the marina in the Nylandian Bay in the west. Avatar Boulevard runs north and south through the intersection, spanning the width of the entire city.
